mapper.select: SELECT email, name, phone, business_name, business_number, address, business_phone, account_bank, account_number, DATE_FORMAT (password_update_date, "%Y-%m-%d") AS password_update_date FROM PARTNER WHERE idx = #{partnerIdx}
SELECT idx AS partner_idx, email, name, phone FROM PARTNER WHERE email = #{email} AND password = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PARTNER (email, password, name, business_name, business_number, phone, business_phone, create_date) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{business_name}, #{business_number}, #{phone}, #{business_phone}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE PARTNER SET password = #{newPassword}, password_update_date = now() WHERE idx = #{partnerIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT idx AS partner_idx, name, email, phone, DATE_FORMAT (create_date, "%Y-%m-%d") AS create_date, approval_status FROM PARTNER ORDER BY create_date DESC
SELECT idx AS partner_idx, email, name, business_number, business_phone, DATE_FORMAT (create_date, "%Y-%m-%d") AS create_date, approval_status FROM PARTNER WHERE idx = #{partnerIdx}
